summary: 2010 LEXUS ES 350.  CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO DEALERSHIP UNABLE TO REPAIR FRONT PASSENGER AIRBAG INFLATOR RECALL NOTICE.  *LD    THE CONSUMER STATED THE MANUFACTURER PROVIDED A LOANER VEHICLE. THE LOANER VEHICLE DID NOT HAVE THE BAR CODE AFFIXED TO IT IN ORDER TO BE PROVIDED ENTRANCE INTO THE CONSUMER'S GATED COMMUNITY NOR, THE SUNPASS FOR TRAVEL ON HIGHWAYS. ALSO, ONLY ONE PERSON WAS PERMITTED TO DRIVE THE VEHICLE. UPDATED 07/10/2017*JS
